mapper.select: SELECT OT.ORDER_ID, OT.INVOICE_NUMBER, OT.MEMBER_ID, OT.ADDR_ID, OT.QUANTITY, OT.TOTAL_PRICE, OT.PAYMETHOD, OT.ORDER_DATE, MT.MEMBER_NICK, A.ADDR FROM ORDER_TBL OT INNER JOIN MEMBER MT ON OT.MEMBER_ID = MT.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN ADDR A ON OT.ADDR_ID = A.ADDR_ID ORDER BY OT.ORDER_ID DESC

SELECT OT.ORDER_ID, OT.INVOICE_NUMBER, OT.MEMBER_ID, OT.ADDR_ID, OT.QUANTITY, OT.TOTAL_PRICE, OT.PAYMETHOD, OT.ORDER_DATE, MT.MEMBER_NICK, A.ADDR FROM ORDER_TBL OT INNER JOIN MEMBER MT ON OT.MEMBER_ID = MT.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN ADDR A ON OT.ADDR_ID = A.ADDR_ID
WHERE
ORDER_ID LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
MEMBER_NICK LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
ORDER BY ORDER_ID DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDER_TBL WHERE
ORDER_ID LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
INVOICE_NUMBER LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${query}%'

SELECT OT.ORDER_ID, OT.INVOICE_NUMBER, OT.MEMBER_ID, OT.ADDR_ID, OT.QUANTITY, OT.TOTAL_PRICE, OT.PAYMETHOD, OT.ORDER_DATE, MT.MEMBER_NICK, A.ADDR FROM ORDER_TBL OT INNER JOIN MEMBER MT ON OT.MEMBER_ID = MT.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN ADDR A ON OT.ADDR_ID = A.ADDR_ID
WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
